org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TestFallbackToUseReplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestFallbackToUseReplay

  • public class TestFallbackToUseReplay
extends Object
    Make sure we could fallback to use replay method if replicateToReplica method is not present, i.e, we are connecting an old region server.
